label.p: Please mark all correct answer items below, to see how a correct answered question respond and to get a feeling for the knowledge-check environment.

choiceresponse.description: Please select all applicable options from the list below. Multiple selections are allowed.

div.p: It shouldn't be that hard, answers which contain the word "correct" have to be clicked.

demandhint.hint: Don't click the answers that contain the word "incorrect".
